item.title: Keynote: Como podemos saber se os resultados da pesquisa s√£o bons? Keynote: How can we tell if the search results are good?
item.description:
Description

The following subjects will be addressed in this talk: * Implicit and explicit feedback * Online and offline evaluation metrics * Domain expert evaluation methodology * Creating an evaluation dataset * Continuous experimentation framework * Open-source tools
item.dc:creator: Thais Viana
